title: The Golden Fleece
author: Spark, Muriel
snippet: All we know of her stay at Law Hill is that she wrote a letter which, according to Charlotte, 'gives an appalling account of her duties – hard labour from six in the morning until near eleven at night, with only one half-hour exercise between.

title: The Ossians
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: Above them rose the Law Hill, its stone war monument dominated by the radio repeater station behind it, towering testaments to the past and present.
